com.sonyericsson.capuchin
Class FlashPlayer

java.lang.Object
  com.sonyericsson.capuchin.FlashPlayer

public class FlashPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used for playing the Flash content. The possible states of the FlashPlayer are:

  • Playing. This is the initial state for the FlashPlayer. In that state, the FlashPlayer performs rendering updates and the Flash engine is in the playing state.
    Possible transitions:
    • To the stopped state, with the stop method.
    • To the paused state, with the pause method.


  • Stopped. In this state the FlashPlayer does not perform rendering updates. The Flash engine is in the stopped state.
    Possible transitions:
    • To the playing state, with the play method.


  • Paused. In this state the Player does not perform rendering update. The Flash engine is in the pause state.
    Possible transitions:
    • To the stopped state, with the stop method.
    • To the playing state, with the play method.

Note that the Flash engine will automatically be paused when it is covered or minimized without altering the FlashPlayer state. The Flash engine will continue in the previous state when it is visible again.

Code example:Create a FlashPlayer with a FlashCanvas 
 .... 
 FlashCanvas flashCanvas = new FlashCanvas(flashImage);
 FlashPlayer flashPlayer = FlashPlayer.createPlayer(flashImage, flashCanvas); 
 flashCanvas.setFullScreen(true);
 ...
 
 // MIDlet method 
 protected void startApp() {
   display = Display.getDisplay (this);
   if (flashPlayer != null) {
      display.setCurrent(flashPlayer.getDisplayable());
    };
 };
 ...
Code example:Create a FlashPlayer with extended FlashCanvas 
 .... 
 FlashCanvas canvas = new MyCanvas(flashImage);
 FlashPlayer player = FlashPlayer.createPlayer(flashImage, canvas);
  ....
   
 class MyCanvas extends FlashCanvas {
 
   ...
    //  Override methods if necessary e.g.
   ...
   
   protected void keyPressed(int keyCode) {
      
   // Handle the keys pressed events in Java before forwarding 
   // to Flash using FlashImage.dispatchKeyEvent()
   
   ...
   
   }
   ...
 }

Method Detail

createFlashPlayer

public static FlashPlayer createFlashPlayer(FlashImage flashImage,
                                            FlashCanvas flashCanvas)
Creates an instance of this player

Parameters:
flashImage - the FlashImage associated with this class.
flashCanvas - the FlashCanvas where to render the Flash frames.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null.

play

public void play()
Transitions the player to the playing state.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the FlashPlayer is not currently in the stopped or paused state.

pause

public void pause()
Transitions this player to the pause state.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the FlashPlayer is not currently in the playing state.

stop

public void stop()
Transitions this player to the stopped state.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the FlashPlayer is not currently in the playing or paused state.

Gets the Displayable from this FlashPlayer.

Returns:
the Displayable.
